basics.name: Michael Schnerring
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I've been a computer geek all my life. I'm passionate about open-source and digital privacy. I like video games and CrossFit. I also blog sometimes.

projects.name: Hugo Gruvbox Theme
projects.description: A retro-looking Hugo theme inspired by gruvbox to build secure, fast, and SEO-ready websites.
highlights: Using modern technologies such as Hugo, NPM, and PostCSS
